SELECT PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_KNAME , SALE_PRICE , PRODUCT_COUNT , CREATE_DATE , MODIFY_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , PLIST.* FROM(SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO
ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC
ORDER BY PRODUCT_COUNT, PRODUCT_NO
ORDER BY PRODUCT_COUNT DESC, PRODUCT_NO ) PLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO , P.PRODUCT_KNAME , P.PRODUCT_ENAME , P.COST_PRICE , P.SALE_PRICE , P.PRODUCT_COUNT , P.WINERY , P.THUMBNAIL , P.CAPACITY , P.ABV , P.TASTE_GRAPH , P.INFORMATION , P.AWARD , P.TIP , P.LABEL_IMAGE , P.STATUS , P.CREATE_DATE , P.MODIFY_DATE , V.VARIETY_NO , V.VARIETY_NAME , T.TYPE_NO , T.TYPE_NAME , C.COUNTRY_NO , C.COUNTRY_NAME , H.HASH_NO , H.HASH_TYPE , H.HASH_NAME , H.STATUS FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN VARIETY V ON(P.VARIETY_NO = V.VARIETY_NO) LEFT JOIN TYPE T ON(P.TYPE_NO = T.TYPE_NO) LEFT JOIN COUNTRY C ON(P.COUNTRY_NO = C.COUNTRY_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_HASHTAG PH ON(P.PRODUCT_NO = PH.PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN HASHTAG H ON(H.HASH_NO = PH.HASH_NO) WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{ productNo }
SELECT TYPE_NO , TYPE_NAME FROM TYPE ORDER BY TYPE_NO
SELECT COUNTRY_NO , COUNTRY_NAME FROM COUNTRY ORDER BY COUNTRY_NO
SELECT VARIETY_NO , VARIETY_NAME FROM VARIETY ORDER BY VARIETY_NO
